content.question: Which of the following is the correct pairing of procedures or rules of each house of the legislative branch?

choices.label: House of Representatives Senate Has a Rules Committee that decides how long debate will be on most bills. Has use of the filibuster and cloture, which can help the minority to defeat a bill.
House of Representatives Senate Approves all revenue bills. Initiates all revenue bills.
House of Representatives Senate Can pass articles of impeachment against a president or a federal judge. Can remove presidential appointees to the cabinet.
House of Representatives Senate The Speaker of the House is the most powerful member of the chamber. The vice president can vote on most bills.

content.answer: House of Representatives Senate Has a Rules Committee that decides how long debate will be on most bills. Has use of the filibuster and cloture, which can help the minority to defeat a bill.

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
